nodes.documentation: @notice A contract interface to compute the penalty given a set of sensed data
nodes.name: PenaltyFunction
compute_penalty

nodes.documentation: @notice This penalty contract computes the penalty by multiplying the penalty of a data with its occurence and summing them up
nodes.name: SimplePenalty

nodes.documentation: @notice This penalty contract computes the penalty by assigning higher weight to values overcoming the threshold with higher index. The first occurrence does not increase the penalty
